import React from "react"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Comment from "../components/Comment" const Discussion = () => { const queryParameters = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search) const id = queryParameters.get("id") //EXTRAER DISCUSIÓN DE LA BD const [myDiscussion, setMyDiscussion] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://127.0.0.1:8000/discussion?id=' + id) .then((res) => { return res.json(); }) .then((data) => { console.log(data); setMyDiscussion(data); }); }, []) //EXTRAER DISCUSIÓN DE LA BD /* const [comments, setComments] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://127.0.0.1:8000/comments?discussion_id=' + id) .then((res) => { return res.json(); }) .then((data) => { console.log(data); setComments(data); }); }) */ return(

{myDiscussion.title}

Discusión de {myDiscussion.group}

{date}

); }; export default Discussion;
